activities: Personal information will be accessed by Vemo (i) to fufill the requirements of customer contracts or subsequent requests for service by customers in the area of workforce planning and reporting, (ii) to test and validate patches and fixes to its workforce planning and reporting software, (iii) to monitor and update its systems, (iv) to aggregate non-personally identifiable data across its customer base, and (v) to comply with legally mandated reporting, disclosure or other legal process requirements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Compliance with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution, as well as commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives as well as the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner .
